page.title: 03DAILY LIFE IN BANCHORY -1
page.content: I get up at 0745 and get washed and dressed. Then I have my breakfast. I have cereal. At 0825 I call for Greig and we go to school. We arrive about 0845. At 0900 we go inside and do some maths until break at 1040. I usually play football up on the field. At 1100 we come inside and do English until 1135, when we go to music. Sometimes we sing or play some instruments. At 1230 we have our lunch. I have a packed lunch of sandwiches, a drink and some biscuits. Then I play football until 1330 when we come inside. We then do project work until 1520 when we go home. I get changed and go out to play football until 1730 when I have to go in to get my tea. I have pizza, chips and beans. Then I watch T.V. until 2115 when I go to bed. I read until 2200 when I go to sleep.
